dct_description_sm: From: Historia Moderna Europ√¶ / Happel. -- Ulm, 1687,1692.

Engraved by: Heinricus Irnsingerus sculp:Ao.1684 (lower right). California as an island of Briggs type, with place names: C. Mendocino, C. de Fortunos, Nova Albion, C. de Pinas, Po. S Franco. Draco, C de S Mana, C d Galera, Peublo d las Canos, I. des Augustin, C. dd Enganno, Po. de la Madalena, Po. de la Trinidad. Top center of each page given pagination: "Pag. i". Figures representing America (top left), Africa (top right), Asia (bottom left) and Europe (bottom right) surround western hemisphere. "Europe figure" holds device labelled "PWCPF".
Western hemisphere only. Page number at top center of map.
Western and eastern hemisphere. 2 hemispheres with page numbers at the top center of each map. No title on either hemisphere.
